about_the_game:
"The time has come and so have I!"

Treat yourself to a total of 104 tracks all jam packed with style from the acclaimed Devil May Cry 4, first released in 2008.

The 222+ minute soundtrack has been reauthored from the original, high quality source material. Formats include MP3 (V0), FLAC (16-bit), and AAC (VBR).
